Source.Name: sdl1-sound
Source.Summary: Library that handles the decoding of several popular sound file formats, such as .WAV and .MP3
Source.Description: SDL_sound is a library that handles the decoding of several popular sound file formats, such as .WAV and .MP3. It is meant to make the programmer's sound playback tasks simpler.
